scenario_text.value: Hey you two. You looking around here?

You could say that. Half searching, half
taking a walk, to be honest.

Walking around here made me realize
something.

The people who lived here led really full
lives.

Yeah. You can really tell that people lived
here wherever you look... Hey!
Hey, guys! I found something we can use!
Oh, you’re right. Good job, Labramon!
Heheh, now we can totally call this a search!
I guess so, hehe.

(Those two are getting along well. That’s
good to see.)

(I don’t think there’ll be any problems even
if I don’t intervene.)
Here, you should take this, Takuma.
Really? But you’re the ones who found it.

It’s fine... I’m not sure I’ll know how to
use it when the time is right.

Back when Minoru and Kaito got mad, I found
myself doubting Labramon in my heart.

At this point, I know for a fact I made
a mistake. Labramon’s protected me so much.

Even so, I let myself get uneasy, and forgot
to be grateful for everything she’s done...

(Man... Aoi seems kind of down. I wish
I could cheer her up.)

(She regrets doubting Labramon. Doesn’t look
like she cares at this point, though.)

(It must be bothering her. What can I do to
make her feel better?)
(What can I say to help?)
Labramon doesn’t mind.
What’s past is past.
Let’s make up for it.

From the looks of it, I don’t think Labramon
is upset about it at all.
What he said, Aoi! I really don’t mind.

I’ll admit it came as a shock, but that’s
about it, really.
Thank you, Labramon.

(She seems a little more relaxed, but I don’t
think that made her regret go away.)

(Hmm... I don’t think anything else I can say
will make her feel better.)

What’s past is past. It’s not like you doubt
her now, do you?

Of course! Labramon doesn’t have a bad bone
in her body.

That’s enough for me. If you believe in me,
I’ll do everything I can.
Labramon... I lean on you so much.
Thank you. I hope I can return the favor.

(It looks like she still regrets doubting
her, but at least she’s more positive now.)
(Those two can make up, no problem.)

If you’re worried about what’s been done, why
not work hard going forward?
Work hard going forward?

I don’t think Labramon wants to see you stay
upset this whole time.
He’s right, Aoi. I want to see you smiling.

If you trust me, and laugh with me, that’ll
give me all the strength I need.
...Is that really enough?
Yeah, let’s give it all we’ve got!
Okay, if that would make you happy, Labramon!

(Good... I think those two are going to be
all right now.)

Thanks for lifting my spirits. I’ll be okay
now.

Good to hear. In that case, I’ll go check out
another spot.
